Identifier.help: Unique string that identifies the resource

Creator.help: Main researchers involved / author of publication in priority order

creatorName.help: Full name of the creator - family, given

givenName.help: The personal or first name of the creator

familyName.help: The surname or last name of the creator

nameIdentifier.help: Uniquely identifies an individual or legal entity, according to various schemes.

nameIdentifierScheme.help: The name of the name identifier scheme.

schemeURI.help: The URI of the name identifier scheme.

affiliation.help: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator.

affiliationIdentifier.help: Uniquely identifies the organizational affiliation of the creator.

affiliationIdentifierScheme.help: The name of the affiliation identifier scheme

schemeURI.help: The URI of the affiliation identifier scheme.

Title.help: name or title by which resource is known - title of a dataset, name of software or instrument

titleType.help: The type of Title (other than the Main Title)

Publisher.help: The name of the entity that holds, archives, publishes, prints, distributes, releases, issues, or produces the resource.

publisherIdentifier.help: Uniquely identifies the publisher, according to various schemes.

publisherIdentifierScheme.help: The name of the publisher identifier scheme.

schemeURI.help: The URI of the publisher identifier scheme.

PublicationYear.help: The year when the data was or will be made publicly available. - YYYY

resourceTypeGeneral.help: The general type of the resource.

Subject.help: Subject, keyword, classification code, or key phrase describing the resource.

subjectScheme.help: The name of the subject scheme or classification code or authority if one is used.

schemeURI.help: The URI of the subject identifier scheme.

valueURI.help: The URI of the subject term.

classificationCode.help: The classification code used for the subject term in the subject scheme.

Contributor.help: The institution or person responsible for collecting, managing, distributing, or otherwise contributing to the development of the resource.

contributorType.help: The type of contributor of the resource.

contributorName.help: The full name of the contributor.

givenName.help: The personal or first name of the contributor.

familyName.help: The surname or last name of the contributor.

nameIdentifier.help: Uniquely identifies an individual or legal entity, according to various schemes.

nameIdentifierScheme.help: The name of the name identifier scheme.

schemeURI.help: The URI of the name identifier scheme.

affiliation.help: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the contributor.

affiliationIdentifier.help: Uniquely identifies the organizational affiliation of the contributor.

affiliationIdentifierScheme.help: The name of the affiliation identifier scheme.

schemeURI.help: URI of the affiliation identifier scheme.

Date.help: Different dates relevant to the work.

dateInformation.help: Specific information about the date, if appropriate.

RelatedIdentifier.help: Identifiers of related resources. These must be globally unique identifiers.

relationType.help: Description of the relationship of the resource being registered (A) and the related resource (B).

schemeType.help: The type of the relatedMetadataScheme, linked with the schemeURI.

resourceTypeGeneral.help: The general type of the related resource.

Description.help: All additional information that does not fit in any of the other categories. May be used for technical information or detailed information associated with a scientific instrument.

GeoLocation.help: Spatial region or named place where the data was gathered or about which the data is focused.

pointLongitude.help: Longitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive east).

pointLatitude.help: Latitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive north).

geoLocationBox.help: The spatial limits of a box using WGS84 coordinates in decimal numbers.

geoLocationPolygon.help: A drawn polygon area, defined by a set of points and lines connecting the points in a closed chain.

polygonPoint.help: A point location in a polygon. There must be at least 4 non-aligned points to make a closed curve, with the last point described the same as the first point.

pointLongitude.help: Longitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive east).

pointLatitude.help: Latitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive north).

inPolygonPoint.help: For any bound area that is larger than half the earth, define a (random) point inside.

pointLongitude.help: Longitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive east).

pointLatitude.help: Latitudinal dimension of point expressed in decimal degrees (positive north).

Language.help: The primary language of the resource.

AlternateIdentifier.help: An identifier other than the primary Identifier applied to the resource being registered.

Size.help: Size (e.g., bytes, pages, inches, etc.) or duration (extent), e.g., hours, minutes, days, etc., of a resource.

Version.help: The version number of the resource.

Rights.help: Any rights information for this resource.

rightsIdentifier.help: A short, standardized version of the license name.

FundingReference.help: Information about financial support (funding) for the resource being registered.

funderIdentifier.help: Uniquely identifies a funding entity, according to various types.

awardNumber.help: The code assigned by the funder to a sponsored award (grant).

awardURI.help: The URI leading to a page provided by the funder for more information about the award (grant).

awardTitle.help: The human readable title or name of the award (grant).

RelatedItem.help: Information about a resource related to the one being registered.

relatedItemType.help: The general type of the related item.

relationType.help: Description of the relationship of the resource being registered (A) and the related item (B).

relatedItemIdentifier.help: The identifier for the related item.

relatedItemIdentifierType.help: The type of the Identifier for the related item.

schemeType.help: The type of the relatedMetadataScheme, linked with the schemeURI.

creator.help: The institution or person responsible for creating the related resource.

creatorName.help: The full name of the related item creator.

givenName.help: The personal or first name of the creator.

familyName.help: The surname or last name of the creator.

titleType.help: Type of the related item title. Use this sub-property to add a subtitle, translation, or alternate title to the main title.

publicationYear.help: The year when the item was or will be made publicly available.

issue.help: Issue number or name of the related item.

number.help: Number of the resource within the related item, e.g., report number or article number.

numberType.help: Type of the related items number, e.g., report number or article number.

firstPage.help: First page of the resource within the related item, e.g., of the chapter, article, or conference paper in proceedings.

lastPage.help: Last page of the resource within the related item, e.g., of the chapter, article, or conference paper in proceedings.

publisher.help: The name of the entity that holds, archives, publishes prints, distributes, releases, issues, or produces the resource.

edition.help: Edition or version of the related item.

Contributor.help: An institution or person identified as contributing to the development of the resource.

contributorType.help: The type of contributor of the resource.

contributorName.help: The full name of the related item contributor.

givenName.help: The personal or first name of the contributor.

familyName.help: The surname or last name of the contributor.
